name: the perfect summer dress...
description:
this dress is on sale!

this pink madras plaid cotton dress is one of a kind. it's perfect for those warm summer days and nights!

it's made of a super lovely lightweight cotton madras and green eyelet fabric!

this dress fits comfortably in the shoulder and yoke and is loose in the hips and waist. there is pink madras bias tape around the neckline and arms.

thank you!

(if you have any questions regarding this top... email me:
tiffanymjewell [at] gmail [dot] com.)


bust size 31-32.5"
waist size 24-26"
length 28" (from arm pit)



**please expect this item in to be mailed within a week once i've received payment**

name: the perfect madras mini
description:
this pink madras mini is so cute and perfect for the hot days (and nights) of summertime! it has an elastic waist and is easy to pull on over your swimsuit!

this skirt can be worn on your waist or your hips and looks cute either way!

if you have any questions about this skirt, please convo me.

fits waist sizes 23"- 29"
fits hips up to sizes 36"
length is 17" (from top to bottom)

**i am also offering this skirt at your size! i can make it just for you!**
please, tell me your wasit and hip size. if you would like a pocket (or two) added to this skirt there will be a $3 extra charge (per pocket) that i will send in an invoice to you.
(i can make this skirt a bit longer too... just let me know!)

**please expect this item in to be mailed within a week once i've received payment**

name: my favorite gingham top
description:
this cotton gingham top is one of a kind. it's perfect for layering over a dark long sleeved top or wearing alone the summer!

it's made of a lovely soft gingham cotton with vintage tulip bias tape trim...and, not to mention it's very comfortable to wear all day long! (and all year long!)

this top fits comfortably in the shoulder and is loose in the hips and waist.

thank you!

name: the katie tank
description:
i love this top!

it's the perfect light weight cotton tank for all of those hot summer days (and nights). the blue and white gingham is paired with lovely pink floral trim. there are also a few pleats around the neckline.

this top fits snug in the bust and waist and looks perfect paired with cut- off shorts or a high- waisted skirt! it goes with everything!
